channel.title: Testing in Space
channel.description: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked → is mine

item.title: Software QS Tag
item.description:
I was invited to speak at Software QS Tag 2020 organized by Imbus AG online event. I presented my talk Test Architecture For Global Platform.

I talked about:

  • Test architectures and challenges
  • How to design global platform
  • What are the tools and frameoworks that can help
  • How to maintain continuous testing

item.title: Quest4Quality
item.description:
I was invited to give a keynote at Quest for Quality Dublin online event. I presented my talk Test Architecture for Global Platform.

I talked about:

  • Test architectures and challenges
  • How to design global platform
  • What are the tools and frameoworks that can help
  • How to maintain continuous testing

item.title: Selenium Day ANZ
item.description:
I was invited to speak at Selenium Day Australia & New Zealand online event. I presented my talk Automation in Mobile Testing.

I talked about:

  • Automation principles
  • How to scope your automation for mobile apps
  • How to design the architecture
  • How to decide and choose tools
  • How to maintain continuous testing for mobile

item.title: The QA Lead podcast
item.description:
I was a guest of Jonathon Wright and his podcast The QA Lead. We were talking about how weâ€™ve provided the best digital experiences for 5 million customers.

You can listen it here.

item.title: London TAD Online Meetup
item.description:

I talked about:

  • Automation principles
  • How to scope your automation for mobile apps
  • How to design the architecture
  • How to decide and choose tools
  • How to maintain continuous testing for mobile

item.title: QA Financial Digital Forum
item.description:
I was invited as a keynote speaker at QA Financial Digital Forum. I presented my talk Crafting Regulatory Compliance in Modern Software Development.

I talked about how modern Software Development practices such as CI/CD, automated testing and documentation can craft regulatory compliance as a part of the agile process.

item.title: TACON Leipzig
item.description:
I was invited as a keynote speaker at TACON 2019. I presented my talk Automation in Mobile Testing. I talked about:

  • Automation principles
